summary: SummaryFormulated in a silky gel texture, Erborian Centella Cleansing Gel removes excess sebum and extra impurities without stripping the skin. It's effective, yet gentle, and helps maintain the skin's natural level of moisture. The result is a more luminous complexion.
details: DetailsBenefitsPacked with good-for-you super ingredients, Centella Cleansing Gel ensures a thorough cleansing experience without stripping skin.Intensely nourishes and preps the skin for the next step.FeaturesThe perfect second step cleanser as it rids the skin of any remaining impurities that may be found beneath the surfaceSafe to use around the eyes.Intentionally made to provide user with added benefits that go beyond cleansing.Key IngredientsCentella Asiatica, most known for its healing properties, adds soothing benefits.Squalane helps nourish and prevents the skin from feeling dehydrated.7-Herb Complex, including Wild Chamomile, Rosemary, and Licorice helps with detoxifying the skin of unwanted impurities.Item 2599503How To UseApply to damp face, including the eye area, and massage gently with circular movements. Rinse thoroughly.IngredientsAqua/Water, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Coco-Betaine, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Chloride, Centella Asiatica Extract, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Allantoin, Squalane, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Polyquaternium-7, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Potassium Hydroxide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Parfum/Fragrance.
how_to_use: Apply to damp face, including the eye area, and massage gently with circular movements. Rinse thoroughly.

reviews.headline: Smells like OG Hollister
reviews.comments: IYKYK this smells like walking into Hollister from back in the day and it's so strong and stays on the skin. I definitely wouldn't repurchase or recommend.

reviews.headline: I will be buying this again.
reviews.comments: I love the foaming and the smell.  It also takes off mascara with very little rubbing.

reviews.headline: It's a Little Drying Over Time
reviews.comments: I tried this cleanser in their sampler. The cleanser is okay. I've been using it because I thought it would help with my breakouts, but it's just been drying my skin out. I've developed dry patches where the breakouts are. Even on areas I don't have them as well. I have combonation skin. Someone with oliy skin may enjoy this facial cleanser. But this product is a pass for me.

reviews.headline: Love it !
reviews.comments: I got this as a sample and omg i have to buy !!! Literally one of the best cleansers ive come across besides cera ve foaming wash. This smells very unique and so good! Thank god for free gifts with purchases :p

faceoff_positive.comments: I have struggled through Alot of products to find something that was kind to my skin but also a good cleanser, this stuff is my go to product now, my skin feels clean and fresh, but light I don't feel like my skin is tight and and dry, I follow this with a few more of their products, absolutely amazing skin care range I have combination skin, and get really oily break outs, since using erborian I have no excess oils, my skin has improved within a week and its the only brand that has got rid of my stubborn black heads. I can't say anything about any of the products I have used except your skin will thank you.
faceoff_positive.headline: Absolutely amazing product

faceoff_negative.comments: I tried this cleanser in their sampler. The cleanser is okay. I've been using it because I thought it would help with my breakouts, but it's just been drying my skin out. I've developed dry patches where the breakouts are. Even on areas I don't have them as well. I have combonation skin. Someone with oliy skin may enjoy this facial cleanser. But this product is a pass for me.
faceoff_negative.headline: It's a Little Drying Over Time
